snippet: The fall arts harvest at PBS, in addition to consisting almost completely of regional theater, music and dance, has a pop flavor.
lead_paragraph: The fall arts harvest at PBS, in addition to consisting almost completely of regional theater, music and dance, has a pop flavor.

headline.main: An Altered ‘Pinafore’ Opens Festival of Arts From Beyond the East Coast
